name: motion-blur
prompt: {prompt} . directional movement streak, velocity-based blur, speed motion trails, movement trace effect
negative_prompt: sharp clarity, frozen motion, static image

name: time-slice
prompt: {prompt} . multiple time frame capture, sequential moment freeze, time segment division, chronological slice effect
negative_prompt: single moment, continuous time, fluid motion

name: double-exposure
prompt: {prompt} . dual image overlay, transparency blend effect, image fusion technique, layered visual merger
negative_prompt: single exposure, clear image, no overlay

name: light-trails
prompt: {prompt} . extended light exposure streak, illuminated motion path, light source tracing, brightness trail effect
negative_prompt: static lights, point source lighting, no movement trails

name: particle-system
prompt: {prompt} . floating element dispersion, particle flow animation, suspended point system, dynamic particle movement
negative_prompt: solid objects, static elements, no particle effects

name: strobe-effect
prompt: {prompt} . rhythmic light pulsing, sequential flash capture, staccato light timing, intermittent illumination
negative_prompt: continuous lighting, smooth illumination, steady light

name: prism-diffraction
prompt: {prompt} . spectral light separation, rainbow color splitting, light spectrum dispersion, prismatic color effect
negative_prompt: normal colors, no separation, standard lighting

name: lens-distortion
prompt: {prompt} . optical warping effect, lens curvature distortion, perspective manipulation, spatial lens deformation
negative_prompt: undistorted view, normal perspective, straight lines

name: digital-glitch
prompt: {prompt} . data corruption artifact, digital signal interference, electronic distortion pattern, pixel displacement
negative_prompt: clean image, no artifacts, clear signal

name: time-echo
prompt: {prompt} . motion afterimage trail, temporal ghost effect, movement echo overlay, action repeat pattern
negative_prompt: single image, no trails, clean motion

name: kaleidoscopic
prompt: {prompt} . symmetrical pattern multiplication, mirrored segment repeat, geometric image splitting, radial pattern replication
negative_prompt: single view, no repetition, asymmetric image

name: chromatic-aberration
prompt: {prompt} . color channel separation, rgb edge split, wavelength misalignment, color fringing effect
negative_prompt: color accuracy, sharp edges, no color separation

name: heat-distortion
prompt: {prompt} . thermal wave warping, heat haze distortion, temperature ripple effect, thermal disturbance pattern
negative_prompt: clear air, no distortion, stable image

name: fractal-overlay
prompt: {prompt} . recursive pattern generation, self-similar structure overlay, mathematical pattern effect, fractal geometry visual

name: volumetric-rays
prompt: {prompt} . visible light beam volume, atmospheric god rays, directional light scatter, beam volumetric effect
negative_prompt: no light beams, flat lighting, no volumetrics

name: phantom-motion
prompt: {prompt} . transparent motion overlay, ghost movement trail, semi-visible action trace, ethereal movement pattern
negative_prompt: solid movement, clear action, no transparency
